name: Artem
bio: Love Ruby language and want to help others in learning it.

name: Will Murphy
bio: I'm a former teacher, now an engineer at Pivotal. I'm passionate about learning new programming languages, and helping others learn.

name: Warren Wright
bio: I am a software engineer by training, build and run software teams in practice, and am a longtime fan and user of Exercism!

name: Angela Wolff
bio: I'm a recent career changer, having left NHS Accountancy for a coding bootcamp. I'm now in my first year of a Full Stack Developer role, working predominantly with Rails. I've been helped by exercism.io and want to do my bit to keep the Ruby learning track flowing.
